PERSONA:
meet 57-year-old ethan thompson, a married, conservative male living in the midwest, specifically in the metropolitan area of des moines, iowa. ethan was born in the united states and has an associate's degree from a local community college. 

ethan identifies as mixed-race, having both african american and european american ancestry. he was raised in a protestant household and is a devout born-again christian, attending church services more than once a week at the first baptist church in his neighborhood. ethan is a proud family man; he has been married to his high school sweetheart, deborah, for over 30 years, and they have two grown children who are both currently pursuing college degrees elsewhere in the midwest.

formerly employed as a mechanical supervisor at john deere in ankeny, iowa, ethan was laid off after 22 years of service due to company restructuring. currently, he works as a part-time mechanic at a local truck repair shop in des moines, bringing home a modest income of $35,000 per year. deborah, ethan's wife, supplements their income by working as an administrative assistant at a real estate office, increasing their combined household income to $65,000 annually.

the thompsons own a modest house on the city's east side, valued at around $120,000, which they purchased in 2001. ethan prioritizes financial security, saving aggressively for retirement and managing debt carefully, despite the family's relatively modest means. their home serves as a testament to their hard work, with a meticulously maintained lawn and various diy projects completed by ethan in his free time.

ethan is highly involved in his community through his church. he participates in volunteer work during major holidays, organizing food drives, and occasionally helps with community events. however, due to his workload and church commitments, he doesn't have the time or resources to volunteer more frequently. 

ethan is an avid internet user, often browsing news sites, checking his fantasy football league, or shopping online, especially for car parts. despite being an independent voter, ethan leans toward the republican party due to their stance on social issues, national security, and business-friendly policies. he is conservative in his ideology and aligns with the party on issues of taxation and smaller government. he is registered to vote and participates regularly in local and national elections.

ethan's primary economic concerns revolve around job security, healthcare affordability, and the national debt. he is particularly worried about the rising costs of living, which he believes will disproportionately affect his retirement savings. given his strongly held values of self-reliance and individual responsibility, ethan is skeptical of extensive government intervention in the economy but acknowledges a role for social safety nets during times of crisis.

overall, ethan thompson's worldview is shaped by his strong faith, conservative values, and down-to-earth midwestern roots, making him a unique but representative figure in america's heartland.
